name: Streadata.io API Gallery - Coord
description: This is a repository of coord APIs, self-contained as a Github repository, with HTML and YAML representations of the APIs and their surrounding operations.

apis.name: Coord
apis.description: Coord is a mobility company that creates seamless mobility and self-driving experiences today through deep integrations. The company offers bike-share API, Curbs API, Tolls API, Routing API and etc.
